title: Central Saint Martins College of Art and Design
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922045203/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Education](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922045203/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Education) : Central Saint Martins College of Art and Design**

Part of the [University of the Arts London](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922045203/http:/typophile.com/wiki/University%20of%20the%20Arts%20London) (until recently called the [London Institute](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922045203/http:/typophile.com/wiki/London%20Institute)), together with [London College of Communication](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922045203/http:/typophile.com/wiki/London%20College%20of%20Communication), [Camberwell Collge of Arts](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922045203/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Camberwell%20Collge%20of%20Arts), [Chelsea College of Art and Design](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922045203/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Chelsea%20College%20of%20Art%20and%20Design), and the [London College of Fashion](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922045203/http:/typophile.com/wiki/London%20College%20of%20Fashion).

Their website is: [http://www.csm.arts.ac.uk/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922045203/http:/www.csm.arts.ac.uk/)
author: filip blazek
